page.title: 17GLEBE FARM, WRENINGHAM
page.content:
Owned by Bernard Matthews PLC, Glebe Farm is 45.88 acres in size, has 23 large air-conditioned sheds which together cover 10.25 acres.These sheds produce 690,000 turkeys per year weighing 10.5 million lbs. The turkeys consume 34 million lbs. of food yearly of which 24 million lbs. is English grain grown on 4000 acres of farmland. Day-old turkeys receive artificial heat from 700 tonnes of gas burned annually, grow to between 8 & 33 lbs. when they are killed for consumption.
The used litter from the sheds is spread on to surrounding land as a fertiliser.
15 men & 1 woman look after the turkeys and are paid over Â£120,000 in annual wages.
